abstract: The LCH.Clearnet Group, a key European securities clearinghouse based in London, has received a takeover bid of as much as $1.2 billion from a consortium of banks, including JPMorgan Chase, according to online media sources including The Wall Street Journal.
lead_paragraph: The LCH.Clearnet Group, a key European securities clearinghouse based in London, has received a takeover bid of as much as $1.2 billion from a consortium of banks, including JPMorgan Chase, according to online media sources including The Wall Street Journal.
